feedTitle: Pluralistic: Daily links from Cory Doctorow
summary: Today's links Weinersmith and Boulet's "Bea Wolf": An absolutely delightful retelling of the bardic masterpiece.  Hey look at this: Delights to delectate.  This day in history: 2009, 2014, 2019 Upcoming appearances: Where to find me...
title: Pluralistic: Weinersmith and Boulet's "Bea Wolf"(24 Jun 2024)

summary:
I was listening to a podcast where the author Ray Bradbury was mentioned.  It was revealed that he had a note above his typewriter that said, “Don't think”. 
He explained that as a creative person, it's more about feeling and less about thinking...
title: Don't think
